Benchmark regions

Source: R/data.R
data.benchmark.regions.Rd

Different world regions described in terms of regions and countries. Data contains lists of vectors, vectors represented in pairs of Long Names (e.g. Country name) and ISO codes (Country ISO 2-char code)

data.benchmark.regions

Format

a list of following pairs of vectors

BenchRegions, BenchRegions_ISO_colnames

Set of benchmark regions

Global, Global_ISO

Global region

Africa, Afrika_ISO

Africa

Brazil, Brazil_ISO

Brazil

China, China_ISO

China

EEurope_Eurasia, EEurope_Eurasia_ISO

Eastern Europe and Eurasia

EU, EU_ISO

Europe

India, India_ISO

India

Japan, Japan_ISO

Japan

LatinAmerica, LatinAmerica_ISO

Latin America

MiddleEast, MiddleEast_ISO

Middle East

NonOECD, NonOECD_ISO

non-OECD countries

NonOECDAsia, NonOECDAsia_ISO

non-OECD countries of Asia

OECD, OECD_ISO

OECD countries

OECDAmericas, OECDAmericas_ISO

OECD countries of Americas

OECDAsiaOceania, OECDAsiaOceania_ISO

OECD countries of Asia and Oceania

OECDEurope, OECDEurope_ISO

OECD countries of Europe

Russia, Russia_ISO

Russia

SouthAfrica, SouthAfrica_ISO

South Africa

US, US_ISO

United States of America

OECDAsiaOceaniaWoJP, OECDAsiaOceaniaWoJP_ISO

OECD countries of Asia and Oceania wihout Japan

OECDAmericasWoUS, OECDAmericasWoUS_ISO

OECD countries of Americas without US

LatinAmericaWoBR, LatinAmericaWoBR_ISO

Latin America without Brazil

AfricaWoZA, AfricaWoZA_ISO

Africa without South Africa

EEurope_EurasiaWoRU, EEurope_EurasiaWoRU_ISO

Eastern Europe and Eurasia without Russia

NonOECDAsiaRest, NonOECDAsiaRest_ISO

non-OECD countries of Asia - the rest

NonOECDRest, NonOECDRest_ISO

non-OECD countries - the rest
